languages.text: [Смягчить голос] "Авель, прошу, объясни, что ты имеешь в виду".
[Soften your tone] "Abel, could you please explain what you mean?"
languages.original_text: [Смягчить голос] "Авель, прошу, объясни, что ты имеешь в виду".

languages.text: [声のトーンを和らげる]「アベル、どういう意味で言ったのか、説明してくれないか？」
languages.original_text: [Soften your tone] "Abel, could you please explain what you mean?"

traits.locale_text: [声のトーンを和らげる]「アベル、どういう意味で言ったのか、説明してくれないか？」

languages.text: [以柔和的语气开口]“亚伯，可以解释一下你的意思吗？”
languages.original_text: [Soften your tone] "Abel, could you please explain what you mean?"

traits.locale_text: [以柔和的语气开口]“亚伯，可以解释一下你的意思吗？”

languages.text: [Sanfter sprechen] "Abel, könntet Ihr bitte erläutern, was Ihr meint?"
languages.original_text: [Soften your tone] "Abel, could you please explain what you mean?"

traits.locale_text: [Sanfter sprechen] "Abel, könntet Ihr bitte erläutern, was Ihr meint?"

languages.text: [Arrondir les angles] « Abel, pourriez-vous m'expliquer ce que vous entendez par là ? »
languages.original_text: [Soften your tone] "Abel, could you please explain what you mean?"

traits.locale_text: [Arrondir les angles] « Abel, pourriez-vous m'expliquer ce que vous entendez par là ? »

languages.text: [Suavizar el tono] «Abel, ¿le importaría explicarse un poco mejor?».
languages.original_text: [Soften your tone] "Abel, could you please explain what you mean?"

languages.text: [Ses tonunu yumuşat] "Abel, lütfen ne demek istediğini açıklar mısın?"
languages.original_text: [Soften your tone] "Abel, could you please explain what you mean?"

traits.locale_text: [Ses tonunu yumuşat] "Abel, lüften ne demek istediğini açıklar mısın?"
